content: Can you use your deduction skills to guess the name of the actor who starred in the movie "The Fanatic" based on a Reddit conversation? One user with the username u/mazzakazza expressed their admiration for the actor's great performance, while another user u/Uverworlds posed a question about the movie. Who is this talented actor?
Based on your description, the actor you're referring to in the movie "The Fanatic" is likely John Travolta. He starred in the film and received notable attention for his performance.
